events.text:
Anyways, what you up to frog?
Seems like you fell a long distance.
I'm Toby
I've been observing this area for a while now, y'know as a "Guard Watcher".
Apparently I'm suppose to look out for creatures that fell here, but I don't really care all that much about it.
But honestly I'm just doing this for the free food.
I have a friend who is ALSO a frog and she is more serious about this "Guard Watcher" thing.
She's acts all dangerous when you first get to meet her but when you get to know her, she's not as dangerous as she seems, but I would still be cautious if I were you.
Anyhow there's a town nearby.
say,
you don't mind if I ask you a favor?
Once you get to the city, you mind getting a bag of  seeds?
I know it's a weird request but don't dig any further to it.
I mean you don't have to..
and I could get it myself but.....
I'm lazy.
Thanks a [color=#FFF200]toad[/color] dude.
I'll be here for a bit, but sooner or later I will be up ahead.
